颿字的基本解释

颿
fān
同“帆”。

颿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fān］
［《廣韻》符切，平凡，奉。］
［《廣韻》扶泛切，去梵，奉。］
(1)马奔驰。
(2)泛指疾速。参见“颿風”。
(3)同“帆”。船帆。亦借指帆船。

颿字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【風字部】　颿； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1414第09
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?扶泛切，音梵。【玉篇】馬疾步也，風吹船進也。【博雅】颿颿，走也。　又【玉篇】扶嚴切，音帆。義同。【左思·吳都賦】樓船舉颿而過肆。【註】舟船之颿，本用此字，今別作帆。周伯琦曰：馬疾步也，从馬風會意，借爲舟颿字。又【崔豹·古今注】曹子貞馬名驚颿，言疾如帆也。　或作䬚，亦作?。

颿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

颿字的起名意思

马奔驰，泛指疾速。

Basic explanation of words
Yin
fān
Same as "sail".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fān］
["Guangyun" symbol  cut, ordinary, bong. ]
["Guangyun" help the pan and cut, go to the Brahma, and give. ]
(1) Horse Benz.
(2) Refers to speed in general. See "颿风".
(3) Same as "sail". Sail. Also refers to sailing boats.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Feng Zi Department】　颿; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1414 Page 09
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Help the pan and cut, sound the Brahman. 【Jade articles】The horse walks quickly, and the boat enters in the wind. 【Bo Ya】Ning Ning, go.　[Jade Chapter] Strictly strengthen, Yinfan. The same meaning. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] The boats in the building passed by. [Note] This word is originally used for boats and boats, but don’t make sails today. Zhou Boqi said: The horse is quick to walk, and it can be borrowed as the word "Zhouying" from Ma Feng's understanding. Also [Cui Bao·Annotation to Ancient and Modern] Cao Zizhen's horse name is shocked, and his words are as sick as sails.　Or as a li, also as a?.
